| History                 = The Undergrowth Resistance was an underground resistance movement formed by the sentient animals and fungi that maintained the biome of [[Planet X]] in response to feelings of oppression by the Arbor Masters. The only [[Flora colossi]] to pay any attention to them and stick up for their rights was [[Groot (Earth-616)|Groot]].

Contrary to what [[Rocket Raccoon (Earth-616)|Rocket Raccoon]] assumed, the Undergrowth Resistance did not want to "throw off their yoke of subjugation", but rather advocated for extra days off work and an increase to their acorn allowance.{{r|Annihilators Vol 1 2}}
